description:
Volume of recycled water used for each direct beneficial use within a retail water suppliers service area. Data provided for actual (2015) and and projected (2020, 2025, 2030, 2035 and 2040) use.
Data accessed from https://wuedata.water.ca.gov/uwmp_export.asp on October 20, 2016.
title: 2015 UWMP Table 6-4 Retail: Current and Projected Recycled Water Direct Beneficial Uses Within Service Area
